item.title: Updated: flake8-bugbear (21.11.29)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 finding likely bugs and design problems in your program. Contains warnings that don't belong in pyflakes and pycodestyle.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-timeout (0.3)
item.description: flake8 plugin which checks that a timeout is set to all requests and urllib.request.open calls
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-functions-names (0.2)

item.title: New: flake8-force-keyword-arguments (1.0.3)
item.description: A flake8 extension that is looking for function calls and forces to use keyword arguments if there are more than X arguments
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-escaping-style (0.1.2)
